content:
# The error indicates that I no longer have any Iron Ore left in my inventory to insert into the Stone Furnace. This means that my previous attempts to smelt Iron Ore have depleted my supply.

# Let's check my current inventory to confirm the available resources.

current_inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Inspect the inventory to check available resources
print(f"Current inventory: {current_inventory}")  # Display current inventory

# Since I need to smelt Iron Ore to produce Iron Plates, I will need to gather more Iron Ore from a nearby resource patch.

# I'll locate the nearest Iron Ore resource and harvest some.

iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Locate the nearest Iron Ore
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the Iron Ore resource location
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Gather some Iron Ore
print(f"Inventory after gathering Iron Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after gathering Iron Ore
